description.narrative: The Tag Vocabulary codelist defines external codelists which themselves provide codes and descriptions for tag elements.
La liste de codes Vocabulaire d'étiquettes définit une gamme de listes externes de codes qui offrent elles-mêmes des codes et descriptions d'étiquettes.

A controlled vocabulary covering all areas of interest of the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) of the United Nations, including food, nutrition, agriculture, fisheries, forestry, environment etc.
A value from the top-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1’)
A value from the second-level list of UN sustainable development goals (SDGs) (e.g. ‘1.1’)

A value from the list of Team Europe Initiatives. Team Europe consists of the European Commission, the EU Member States — including their implementing agencies and public development banks — as well as the European Investment Bank (EIB) and the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD).
